alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Howard; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Greeley, southeastern Valley, northeastern Sherman and northwestern Howard Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Loup, or 14 miles southeast of Ord, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cotesfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
